Description: Funerary papyrus of Padikhons-[..] containing First Book of Breathing (incomplete version) written in hieratic on the recto. Hieratic and Greek text palimpsest on the verso.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 83-84, pls. 46-48.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (173)
Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (pp.83-84, pls.46-48)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57812) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57812)
